features: Our bestselling Mini Quick Pack gets a makeover with 12oz cotton canvas

Built to be an answer for shorter trips and daily errands, this pack takes all of the best-loved features of its larger version and adds them to an even more streamlined, compact package for on the road
External zippered pocket with key clip
Cotton canvas with water repellent finish
External diagonal zippered pocket with internal key clip
Fully-lined main compartment with hanging envelope pocket
1.5" seatbelt waist strap (carry in waist pack or sling pack mode)
Oversized YKK zippers with paracord zipper pulls
Top two-way closure zipper with access to main compartment
Materials : 12oz cotton canvas with water repellent finish, 210D nylon pack cloth
